一、引言沟通(Communication)字根的原意是恳谈(Communion),亦即密切的双方分享或交换,是思想与概念的结合。真正的沟通代表仔细聆听、观察与对话,而且是建立在事实的.

entry.def: Communion with nature or with a person is the feeling that you are sharing thoughts or feelings with them.
Communion is the Christian ceremony in which people eat bread and drink wine in memory of Christ's death.
